Catalano.Imaging.Filters

Class ResizeBicubic

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.Imaging.Filters.ResizeBicubic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBaseInPlace

    public class ResizeBicubic
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBaseInPlace
    Resize image using bicubic interpolation algorithm. The class implements image resizing filter using bicubic interpolation algorithm. It uses bicubic kernel W(x) as described on http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bicubic_interpolation#Bicubic_convolution_algorithm (coefficient a is set to -0.5).
